source.sqlReaderQuery:
with Salesperson_Purchaser_cte	as 
(
Select 
	[Code],
	[Name],
	[A_S_M_],
	[Agent],
	[ARM],
	[Location Code],
	[Route],
	[Sales hierarchy code],
	[Global Dimension 1 Code],
	[Zone],
	'10001' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Salesperson_Purchaser]
UNION ALL
Select 
	[Code],
	[Name],
	[A_S_M_],
	[Agent],
	[ARM],
	[Location Code],
	[Route],
	[Sales hierarchy code],
	[Global Dimension 1 Code],
	[Zone],
	'10002' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - CHENNAI$Salesperson_Purchaser]

Select 
[Code],
[Name],
[A_S_M_],
[Agent],
[ARM],
[Location Code],

[Global Dimension 1 Code],
[Zone],
'10003' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - CHHATTISGARH$Salesperson_Purchaser]

[Sales hierarchy code],

FROM [dbo].[BIPL â€“ SAHIBABAD$Salesperson_Purchaser]

	[Zone Code],

	[SE Code],

	[Business Unit],
	'10021' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - WESTBENGAL$Sales hierarchy]
),
Left_join_cte as 
(
Select 
	--sp
	sp.[Code],
	sp.[Name],
	sp.[A_S_M_],
	sp.[Agent],
	sp.[ARM],
	sp.[Location Code],
	sp.[Route],
	sp.[Sales hierarchy code],
	sp.[Global Dimension 1 Code],
	sp.[Zone],
	sp.Site_Code,

	--sh
	sh.[Sales Executive Name],
	sh.[Sales Manager Name],
	sh.[Area Sales Manager Name],
	sh.[Branch Sales Head Name],
	sh.[Regional Sales Head Name],

	--GEO
	sh.[Area Code],
	sh.[Area Name],
	sh.[Branch Code],
	sh.[Branch Name],
	sh.[Territory Code],
	sh.[Territory Name],
	sh.[Region Code],
	sh.[Region Name],
	sh.[Zone Code],
	sh.[Zone Name],
	sh.[National Code],
	sh.[National Name],
	sh.[Division Name]

	--concat(sp.Site_Code,'|', sp.[Sales hierarchy code]) as sp_key,
	--concat(sh.Site_Code,'|', sh.[Territory Code]) as sh_key
from 
	Salesperson_Purchaser_cte as sp
left join
	Sales_hierarchy_cte as sh
on
sp.[Sales hierarchy code] = sh.[Territory Code]) and sp.Site_Code = sh.Site_Code	
)
Select 
	*
from 
	Left_join_cte

Select 
	Distinct
	Left(RIGHT(TABLE_NAME, 21),11) as TABLE_NAME
from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
where TABLE_NAME like '%Salesperson_Purchaser'
